name: T.P. (Night City)
description:
It's a lonely night and you just need to make a quick rest stop. But the foul stench of evil threatens to make your trip to the lavatory a little unpleasant. You've heard the rumors, but you can't hold it forever...

T.P. is a virtual reality game where the call of nature becomes a journey to the bowels of hell itself.

Currently only available as anAPK for Oculus Quest.

View the game's development documentation on GitHub (spoilers).

Credits Game design and programming

David Antognoli

Visual design

Michael Vaughn Green

Sound design

Aaron Baer

Music

Original soundtrack by Haddonfield A.V.

External art assets credits listed here: https://github.com/dantogno/tp/wiki/Credits
